title: Strengthening HR Management Competencies: Data-Driven Learning Analytics for Science Education Design

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can analyze digital learning data generated by LMS and explain at least three of their own learning patterns
Learners can derive correlations with science subject performance using learning analytics tools and establish improvement plans
Learners can design personalized learning strategies based on performance comparison data with peer learners
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
